scripts.test:parallel:chrome: npm run clean:reports-chrome && npm-run-all --parallel --continue-on-error test:header:chrome test:homepage:chrome test:learningresources:chrome && npm run test:merge-reports-chrome && npm run  test:generate-report-chrome
scripts.test:parallel:firefox: npm run clean:reports-firefox && npm-run-all --parallel --continue-on-error test:header:firefox test:homepage:firefox test:learningresources:firefox && npm run test:merge-reports-firefox && npm run test:generate-report-firefox
scripts.test:all:chrome: npm run clean:reports-chrome && CYPRESS_REPORT_DIR=mochawesome-report-chrome npx cypress run --browser chrome && npm-run-all test:merge-reports-chrome test:generate-report-chrome
scripts.test:all:firefox: npm run clean:reports-firefox && CYPRESS_REPORT_DIR=mochawesome-report-firefox npx cypress run --browser firefox --headless && npm-run-all test:merge-reports-firefox test:generate-report-firefox
scripts.test:smoke:chrome: npm run clean:reports-chrome && CYPRESS_REPORT_DIR=mochawesome-report-chrome npx cypress run --env grepTags=@smoke --browser chrome && npm-run-all test:merge-reports-chrome test:generate-report-chrome
